Object.Field: Use SET or MULTISET table for work table

Specifies the way the Teradata Connector will load the data. Valid values are:
- batch.insert: multiple JDBC connections using batched prepared statements (simplest to start with) - multiple.fastload: multiple FastLoad connections - internal.fastload: single coordinated FastLoad connections (most performant)
Please see Cloudera's Teradata Connectors User Guide for more details.
Internal base KM for any Sqoop Export LKMs
Specifies the degree of parallelism. More precisely the number of mappers. Number of mapper processes used for extraction. When SQOOP_PARALLELISM > 1, SPLIT_BY must be defined

Use this option if you wish to override standard technology specific work table options. When left blank, these options values are used - Oracle: NOLOGGING - DB2 UDB: NOT LOGGED INITIALLY - Teradata: no fallback, no before journal, no after journal
/* Only required for Teradata Connector */ skipTaskGeneration = !isToTeradata || useGeneric
/* Only required for Teradata Connector */ skipTaskGeneration = !isToTeradata || useGeneric
